sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_cab14a691b8f5110ace755f0604bcbf9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>REST API Engine Testing</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[params = {
    paginate: {
        perPage: 1,
        page: 1
    },
    sort: {
        by: 'id',
        order: 'DESC'
    },
    // payload: {
    // description: 'Incident created from API',
    // state: '2',
    // problem: {
    // description: 'Problem created from API',
    // },
    // parent: 'INC0009004'
    // },
    payload: [{
            description: 'Incident created from API',
            state: '2',
            problem: {
                description: 'Problem created from API',
            },
            parent: 'INC0009004'
        },
        {
            description: 'Incident created from API - 2',
            state: '2',
            problem: {
                description: 'Problem created from API - 2',
            },
            parent: 'INC0009004'
        }
    ],
    table: 'incident' /* Mandatory */
};

var s = new APIUtils(params);

//response = s.getRequest();
response = s.postRequest();

gs.info(response);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-08 20:20:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>cab14a691b8f5110ace755f0604bcbf9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>REST API Engine Testing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_cab14a691b8f5110ace755f0604bcbf9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-08 20:20:31</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_rest_api_configuration_object"><u_rest_api_configuration_object action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_rest_api_configuration_object</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-07 18:01:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>d25894d91b4b1110ace755f0604bcb26</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-08 19:19:30</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_api_field_name>problem</u_api_field_name><u_choice_set display_value="state" element="state" name="incident">3217dae4f9c211108c8bd16244dfe79e</u_choice_set><u_configuration_table display_value="CONFTBL0001001">e0682cd91b8b1110ace755f0604bcb1c</u_configuration_table><u_display>false</u_display><u_field display_value="Problem" element="problem_id" name="incident">47f312a4f98211108c8bd16244dfe7db</u_field><u_format>dd.MM.yyyy</u_format><u_get>true</u_get><u_number>OBJCONF0001023</u_number><u_order>60</u_order><u_post>true</u_post><u_put>false</u_put><u_query>false</u_query><u_referenced_table_id/><u_referenced_table_name/><u_required>false</u_required><u_script_get><![CDATA[(function(scope, record) {
    try {
// 		var response = !gs.nil(record.getValue('problem_id')) ?
// 			new APIUtils({ table: 'problem' })._decodeGr(record.problem_id.getRefRecord()) :
// 			'';
// 		return response;
		return record.getDisplayValue('problem_id');
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record);]]></u_script_get><u_script_post><![CDATA[(function(scope, record, value) {
    try {
		return new APIUtils({ table: 'problem', recursiveCall: true, payload: value }).postRequest();
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record, value);]]></u_script_post><u_script_put><![CDATA[(function(scope, record, value) {
    try {
		return undefined;
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record, value);]]></u_script_put><u_table display_value="Incident" name="incident">07f312a4f98211108c8bd16244dfe7d8</u_table><u_type>script</u_type></u_rest_api_configuration_object></record_update>

    try {
		var response = !gs.nil(record.getValue('problem_id')) ?
			new API_Problem()._decodeGr(record.problem_id.getRefRecord()) :
			'';
		return response;
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record);]]></u_script_get><u_script_post><![CDATA[(function(scope, record, value) {
    try {
		return new API_Problem({soft: true, payload: value}).postRequest();
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record, value);]]></u_script_post><u_script_put><![CDATA[(function(scope, record, value) {
    try {
		return undefined;
	} catch (e) {
		scope.error = e;
	}
})(scope, record, value);]]></u_script_put><u_table display_value="Incident" name="incident">07f312a4f98211108c8bd16244dfe7d8</u_table><u_type>reference</u_type></u_rest_api_configuration_object></record_update>
